verbs.description: [ARG0: investigators] [V: search] [ARGM-LOC: opel premises in diesel emissions probe] german prosecutors said monday that law enforcement officials have conducted searches at automaker opel as part of an investigation into suspected manipulation of diesel emissions meanwhile the country transportation ministry said it intended to order 100 000 opel vehicles recalled saying opel had dragged out voluntary fixes the dpa news agency reported that investors went to company facilities monday in the cities of russelsheim and kaiserslautern opel grandland probe diesel opel
